name: Lost in Spacetime
description:
A poem from internationally best selling author David Jones, owner of the storydj instagram writing account followed by over 280,000 readers. The poem tells a story of doomed love amongst the infinite cosmos. My writing explores the connections between the vastness of our universe and the personal feelings that we all experience in day to day life.

All images are archived representations of space, planets and the stars, evoking a nostalgic feel.

Poem reads:

Lost in Spacetime

Our wandering souls
Are
Wandering stars.

Trapped on
Our orbits, we pass
Each other through
Dead space,

Reach out:
A finger touch,
Make wishes,

But only silence
Answers.
